# ObservableSortedList&lt;TSort,TKey,TValue&gt;.ItemComparer property

Set a comparer to determine the sort order of the list.

```csharp
public IComparer<KeyValuePair<TSort, TValue>> ItemComparer { set; }
```

## Remarks

Setting a comparer triggers a sort of the data in the list. The default comparer is available in the static property [`DefaultComparer`](./DefaultComparer.md).
